CustomField.description: The below profiles are restricted from creating Opportunities, Leads and Campaigns. We must have a minimum of 600 users with this restriction to comply with our contract, so this field helps us monitor compliance
CustomField.formula: IF(Profile.Name = "Chatter (Full SF License)", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "CSC - National Accounts", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "CS Console Pilot Support - Restricted", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "CSP & TM - ANI - Vx - Support Restricted", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "CSP Support - Restricted", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "CAN - CS and Sourcing", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "Customer Service Exec", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "eBusiness Director", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "eBusiness Manager", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "Executive Read Only", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "Executive Sponsor", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "Finance", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "IT Admin", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "Lead Management - Marketing", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "Marketing Restricted - Lightning", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "Pricing - Lightning", "Yes", IF(ProfileId = "00e70000000swa8","Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "Sales Admin", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "Sales Admin Restricted - Lightning", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "Sourcing", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "Sourcing - Lightning", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "Product Item Maintenance - Lightning", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "Specialist - Packaging VP & Dir", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "Supply Chain", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "Training and Support", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "Training and Support - Console", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "Training and Support - Lightning", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "Service Desk Users", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "Supply Chain - 3PL Restricted", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "Sales Rep - Restricted", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "UGS", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "Regional Sales Admin Restricted - Lightning", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "PDN Restricted - Lightning", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "VE Branch Mgr - Restricted - Lightning", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "VLS Restricted - Lightning", "Yes", IF(Profile.Name = "Veritiv Support Restricted - Lightning", "Yes", "No" ))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Restricted User
